title: Researching a Company for an Exposé
description: A reporter is starting an investigation into a local company suspected of environmental violations and needs to gather initial background information.

tasks.description: Search public records for the company's corporate filings, permits, and any past fines or citations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of relevant legal and corporate documents.

tasks.description: Scan news archives and social media for any previous reporting or public discussion about the company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a summary of prior coverage and public sentiment.

tasks.description: Identify key executives and board members and search for their professional histories and potential conflicts of interest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a profile for each key person associated with the company.
